XSLT templates are stored in the _xslt_ directory inside the profile directory (this can ba changed in the profile configuration file). Every template has its own folder that constains the XSL files and a _template.xml_ file.
The template XML file defines basic template configuration. It contains information about the template entry point (main XSL file), dependencies and template name.
The template XML file has a root element _template_ that contains an attribute _name_ to set the template name. The root element contains two elements, _entryPoints_ and _dependencies_.
Entry points tag has an attribute _default_ that tells the system the file name (extension included) of the default main XSL file in case to specific language entry point is found. Children elements _entryPoint_ can be added with the attributes _l;anguage_ and _file_.
Dependencies element contains _pluginDependency_ as children elements. They just need the name of the plugin.
